title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
summary: Quick and healthy mixed vegetable stir-fry with soy sauce and sesame.

title: Chocolate Brownies
summary: Rich and fudgy chocolate brownies with a crackly top.

title: Avocado Toast
summary: Creamy avocado smashed over toasted sourdough with chili flakes and lemon.
